summary: Provides a command‑line interface that orchestrates TLO model simulations on Azure services. It loads configurations and scenarios, creates Azure Batch jobs, uploads input files to Azure File Shares, adds tasks, monitors execution, and retrieves results. Helper utilities manage Azure credentials, storage, and key‑vault secrets.
business_intent: Enable users to run, monitor, and manage TLO model workloads in the cloud via simple CLI commands, abstracting Azure Batch and storage operations.
